synopsis:
Animations released on Pokémon Kids TV Japan YouTube channel

Episodes:
#1: Zuruggu and Mimikkyu (ズルッグとミミッキュ), released June 4, 2020.
#2: The Yancham Who Wants to Be a Hero (ヒーローになりたいヤンチャム), released May 5, 2021.
#3: A Budding Dream (ユメノツボミ) released June 6, 2021.
#4: Wait Here, Koiking! (まっててね！コイキング) released July 2, 2021
#5: The Warm and Cozy Magmag House (ぽかぽかマグマッグハウス) released August 5, 2021
#6: I Turned Into a Gengar! (ゲンガーになっちゃった！？)  released September 10, 2021
#7: Summer Vacation Blizzard (ふぶきのなつやすみ) release October 8, 2021
#8: Purin no Uta (プリンのうた), released December 28, 2021.
